website_summaries.verdict: The grandaddy of baitcasters, this classic reel casts smoothly and is versatile enough for all kinds of fishing.
pros: Sturdily built, the carbon matrix drag system is top-rated
Line alarm makes reel great for setting lines, such as when catfishing
cons: Drag doesn’t always engage tightly enough for heavier lures, and doesn’t work at all for some

customer_reviews.title: These new style C3 reels are awesome. I purchased several of the 4600 C3 model
customer_reviews.text: These new style C3 reels are awesome. I purchased several of the 4600 C3 model. They have a thumb bar spool release. The new style C3 reels have 4 bearings, 2 on the spool, one on the level wind and one anti-reverse. I spooled them up with 15 lb. Big Game and have caught 60+ stripers since they were delivered a couple of weeks ago. I have used the C3 and C4 reels in salt water for many years. Just spray them off with fresh water after each use. Disassemble and do the lubrication maintenance annually.
customer_reviews.author: Aquadog

customer_reviews.title: My go to tough as nails baitcaster.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say here for those familar with abu 4***-6*** series reels they are very reliable and tough reels and this reel fit that mold. I am very happy with this purchase and would reccomend it to anyone looking for a tough long lasting reel. I suggest this more for people that know how to use bait casting gear since it offers less in the way of adjustment for cast control than some other options, but if you know how to bait cast these reels are a great choice as always.
customer_reviews.author: boughtit

customer_reviews.title: Love the C3's
customer_reviews.text: I love the Abu Garcia C3 reels. I know have 10 of them in three different sizes. They have great drags and will basically last forever if you maintain them properly. If I had one complaint is only the 6500 size comes with clickers. The last 3 5500's I bought cost another $20 each to add them. I mostly use them for trout sized fish now but have caught sturgeon over 60# with 6500's and the 5500's make great salmon trolling reels. One thing to remember is the C3's are Swedish and great quality. The S models are from China and are much lower in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several Abu Garcia round reels. This reel functions well. I use it in the SF Bay for stripers and I prefer lower number of bearings and centrifugal brakes for this kind of fishing throwing lures. The old fashioned side button bail won't let you accidentally depress it when handling. In the past I have changed out parts like the drag but so far out of the box it is all good.
customer_reviews.author: Alan F. Paredes

customer_reviews.title: C3 6500
customer_reviews.text: This is a good reliable reel. I use mine for catfishing paired up with an Ugly Stick Heavy action Catfish bait cat rod. I have caught dozens of catfish with it so far, and nor one problem from the reel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, solid reel
customer_reviews.text: liked ABU reels since the 70's and this version is very fine. Narrow spool comfortable in hand, casts long distances, minimal backlash issues. I am right handed but bought left hand retrieve so I do not have to change hands after casting. Came from the factory with the casting brake set at 50% and have felt no need to change that. Still odd that the definitive bass fishing reel should come from Sweden.
customer_reviews.author: HHP

customer_reviews.title: Sooo far Sooo good
customer_reviews.text: This reel casts really smooth. The clicker does the job though I haven't used the clicker sense i troll anyway. The handle is great some or most might get a power handle because the original is small, but for me its alright, eeh i wish the handle was made in cork as you see why it would be nice 🙂 I cuaght 1 25lb catfish on this reel and casting many times didn't seem to hesitate or grind! Does the Abu Garcia 6500 C3 have a clicker? Yes!
customer_reviews.author: Saints Turtle

customer_reviews.title: faulty drag system
customer_reviews.text: I casted only a handful of times, just to find out that the drag is faulty. Something is wrong with the spool itself, seems like it has no brakes/washers to tighten the line. No matter which way I tighten the drag knob, it does nothing to actually tighten the spool, therefore, the line. So when i cast, even minimal weight keeps the line from being reeled in. I'm aware of the return window closing, but isn't there warranty on the item? $100 isn't cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Edo Brisku

customer_reviews.title: Garbage seller.
customer_reviews.text: Your replacement reel was garbage!!! Where are you getting them from? The first one with the drag fully tightened my 6 year old ran around the house with my braided line. Yeah I wasted $40 worth of braided line on the first one. Then the replacement came in and the same thing. It’s been a month since I ordered the first one and it’s just garbage. Abu Garcia have great reels but what you’re selling is crap!!!
customer_reviews.author: david reed

customer_reviews.title: Does now show right reel on 4600 models
customer_reviews.text: The 4600 models have a cheap plastic thumb button not a SS side press.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome reels as usual. I own several of these from 5500-6500 and they work great for catfishing.....

customer_reviews.title: Awesome reels.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome reels. They are very well made and work great. Would highly recommend. Make sure you always buy the ones that are made in Sweden not China.

customer_reviews.text: Great reel to have and own and it is Made in Sweden , Not China ( crap place to produce any product ) . Will definitely buy this reel again in future as long as it is Made in Sweden.

customer_reviews.text: this reel casts like butta! Love the braking system, no tangles, casts just as far as my catmaxx baitcasting reel, probably have 100 yards or so of 30lb mono on here!

customer_reviews.text: I am a very big fan of the ABU GARCIA BAITCASTER's. It is my prefered reel of choice. None can compair to its workmanship. It is beyond a dought the best on the market today.

customer_reviews.text: I have been using nothing but a Shimano Curado for the past decade. I decided to get something a little more heavy duty since I moved to a water front house on Lake Livingston and knew I was going to be fishing daily. The first 4 casts were bird nested lol, but after getting the drag set just right this reel casts great. Besides those first few casts, this thing has performed great.

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Abu Garcia Reel
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a Christmas gift and it was used the next day. In combination with the Rippin Lips pole my husband was thrilled with his Christmas gift. I would definitely recommend this reel to anyone looking for a good quality reel for an avid or novice fisherman.
customer_reviews.author: TA595

customer_reviews.title: bought through tackle outle
customer_reviews.text: bought my first abu from walmart impulse always used spinning reels and gave it a try got used to the reel and loved how it performed for such a cheap reel ended up upgrading quickly to this and was extremely impressed was smooth and cast a mile and on my third trip out with it i hauled in a 43 lb blue that fought like bull and the reel held up. the seller is amazing i recommend frank to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D Peacock JR

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: First baitcaster reel I've ever bought, spooling was easy enough. The retrieve is very smooth. The centrifugal brakes are placed on the left side under the plate, so adjusting on the fly isn't very ideal if you're out using the thing (at least for me, I don't happen to carry a phillips head screwdriver in my tackle box). After a few birdsnests and playing with the settings, its pretty much been easy to use. Handles the small channel catfish with ease. Casts a one ounce weight plus lure further than my old spinning reel by a good 20 yards.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Aschoff

customer_reviews.title: Awesome reel. Most of the review's on here are ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome reel. Most of the review's on here are 100% accurate. I've since purchased a 2nd one to go along with a Ugly Stick Catfish rod. Awesome combo.
customer_reviews.author: BWha

customer_reviews.title: Best reel, best value!
customer_reviews.text: Best all-around reel on the market! Bought specifically for a catfish setup, but plan to use it for a little bit of everything!

product_meta.title: ABU GARCIA AMBASSADEUR C3 ROUND REEL
product_meta.description: Combining smooth drag with a durable, finely crafted design, the Abu Garcia C3-5500 Ambassadeur Baitcast Fishing Reel is an ideal choice for devoted anglers. This fishing reel's Carbon Matrix drag system offers smooth and consistent drag across the entire drag range, giving you the precision and power you need to subdue the most tenacious gamefish. It is also engineered for precise casting and line lay. The reel's six-pin centrifugal brake applies consistent pressure throughout the cast for superior control, while its synchronized level wind system ensures an even line lay and an effortless retrieve. And thanks to its extended bent cranking handle and power knob, this baitcasting reel offers the powerful, even reeling action and leverage that hard-fighting fish demand.
feature_bullets: 3 stainless steel ball Bearings + 1 roller bearing provides smooth Operation
Carbon matrix drag System gives smooth drag performance
Compact bent handle and Star provide a more Ergonomic design
6 pin centrifugal brake gives consistent brake pressure throughout the cast
Synchronized level wind System improves line lay and stability
